summary: After a UFO crashes in Arizona, due to a space collision with a NASA satellite launch, the U.S. government tries to cover-up the incident for political reasons.
cast: Gary Collins|Robert Vaughn|James Hampton|Philip Abbott|Joseph Campanella|Pamela Bellwood|Tom Hallick|Steven Keats|William Schallert|Darren McGavin|Cliff Osmond|Andrew Bloch|Stuart Pankin|Betty Ann Carr|H.M. Wynant|Bill Zuckert|Jesse Bennett|Robert Bristol|Ed E. Carroll|J.R. Clark|Craig Clyde|John William Galt|Anne Galvan|Ken Hepner|Michael Irving|Bruce Katzman|Peter Liakakis|Debrah Macfarlane|Chesley Noone|H.E.D. Redford|Max Robinson|Ocie Robinson|Michael Ruud|Scott Wilkinson
title: Hangar 18
